name: Tiny Machines Arena
description:
Local multiplayer cars shooter game.

Description

Top down isometric graphics, likes many of racing games I loved when i was child.

Controls

Press Fire to add player

  • Keyboard 1 : Arrow  + right ctrl (fire)
  • Keyboard 2 : WSQD + leftctrl (fire)
  • Xbox Controllers : Triggers to accelerate/brake + button A (fire)

Features

  • Fast paced car fighting
  • One hit = One Kill : Always under pressure !
  • Up to 10 players (keyboard & controllers)
  • Easy to learn but hard to master driving & drifting model !
  • Dumb bots for training, waiting for friends
  • 2 levels
  • 1 mode : Deathmatch
